title: Gold Support looking for serious team
body:
Hi there,

This account is not my actual league account because I can't log into it on the boards, only in league, which is weird.

Anyway, I am a gold support main who's aiming for plat this season who's looking for a skilled, non raging team who try their best and are serious about playing. Hopefully to compete in a couple of events and see how we go. 

Practicing is a MUST I want to be doing training exercises and general practice as well as ranked 5s, so hopefully practice a couple nights a week.

I've played with and against plats and diamonds so I'd be comfy joining a team around that level if they are keen, still gotta climb out of gold though. 

Add me on league to talk more: MetaHew.

Thanks :)

replies.body: Join my ranked 5s team and add me in game
